lead_paragraph: For anyone who’s ever loathed and loved a sibling in equal measure, The Mend is the wonderfully strange and acidic debut comedy from writer / director John Magary.   Shot through with the wicked humor and anarchy of Bruce Robinson's Withnail&I and
